title: In the Forbidden Land: An Account of a Journey in Tibet, Capture by the Tibetan Authorities, Imprisonment, Torure, and Ultimate Release
description: According to Wikipedia: "Arnold Henry Savage Landor (1865-26 December 1924) was an English painter, explorer, writer and anthropologist, born in Florence. His grandfather was the poet and writer Walter Savage Landor, who himself lived for long periods in Florence."
author: Arnold Henry Savage Landor
